O

OAuth2UsersConfiguration - Class in org.lfenergy.operatorfabric.users.configuration.oauth2
Specific authentication configuration for the Users service It is necessary because when converting the jwt token the OAuth2GenericConfiguration relies on a user service cache and proxy to get user details, which is useless in the case of the Users Service itself.
OAuth2UsersConfiguration() - Constructor for class org.lfenergy.operatorfabric.users.configuration.oauth2.OAuth2UsersConfiguration

opfabJwtConverter(UserRepository) - Method in class org.lfenergy.operatorfabric.users.configuration.oauth2.OAuth2UsersConfiguration
Generates a converter that converts Jwt to OpFabJwtAuthenticationToken whose principal is a User model object
